mapper.select: SELECT QUAL_CNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) QUAL_CNT FROM EMP_QUAL WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}) Q

SELECT QUAL_NO, QUAL_NAME FROM (SELECT QUAL_NO, QUAL_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY QUAL_NO) AS RNUM FROM QUAL WHERE QUAL_NAME like '%'||#{schCName}||'%') Q WHERE Q.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM QUAL WHERE QUAL_NAME LIKE '%'||#{schCName}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM SECTOR WHERE SECTOR_NAME LIKE '%'||#{schCName}||'%'

SELECT SECTOR_NO, SECTOR_NAME FROM (SELECT SECTOR_NO, SECTOR_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SECTOR_NO) AS RNUM FROM SECTOR WHERE SECTOR_NAME like '%'||#{schCName}||'%') S WHERE S.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt}
SELECT REGION_NO, REGION_NAME FROM REGION WHERE CITY_NO = #{cityNo} ORDER BY REGION_NO
